meanings.definition: A tumor composed of blood or lymph vessels.
meanings.sent1: The doctor discovered an angioma during the patient's check-up.
meanings.sent2: The angioma on her arm was causing her discomfort.
meanings.sent3: The angioma decided to throw a party for all the blood vessels in the body.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like an angioma, slowly growing and impossible to ignore.
meanings.sent5: The angioma looked like a cluster of tiny red grapes under the microscope.

meanings.definition: A benign growth of blood vessels in the skin or internal organs.
meanings.sent1: The angioma on his face was small but noticeable.
meanings.sent2: She had an angioma removed from her liver last year.
meanings.sent3: The angioma in the garden seemed to be the favorite spot for butterflies to gather.
meanings.sent4: His kindness bloomed like an angioma in the community.
meanings.sent5: The angioma on the tree trunk looked like a beautiful, tangled web of veins.
